events.text: It is I, my guy! Just came to see your thoughts on the farm again... Plus the ceremony starting soon...
Actually, I think I might go for it... But I heard about this thing called composting. What do you know about it?
OH MY GA- Yes you need that! Basically its fertilizer for your soil. HOWEVER, it is form of recycling. So reuse, reduce, recycle... Ya know?
Ahhh for real? That sounds good. I might ACTUALLY have to go into this farming thing... It's always been a dream but I didn't think I could actually do it until you came... Thanks man!
